about_the_game:
Journey to a mystical realm of castles, kings… and construction!

Kingdom Flipper gives you the power to build majestic palaces and wondrous castles amid an awe-inspiring landscape straight from the mists of time. As architect for the King, you turn natural vistas into the canvas for your architectural artistry, building majestic strongholds and sweeping citadels.

Take on the challenge of reviving broken-down castles, transforming old ruins into glorious new splendor. Let your imagination run wild. You are limited only by your vision, your ambition and your resources. But be careful. Fail in your task and the King could decide to cut off your head.

With your trusty toolkit in hand, explore a wondrous landscape of crumbling strongholds, each with its own unique history, location, and architectural style. From narrow town alleys, to an icy mountain citadel, to a fog-wreathed fortified lighthouse, every one is waiting for your iron hammer to return it to its former glory.

Clear ruins! Repair walls! Fix broken furniture, and restore grand halls! Salvage resources when you clear rubble, and restructure the castle the interior to your own tastes. Your design rules supreme as you place regal furniture, decorations, and artwork to create the castle of your dreams.
 
From wind-swept glacial mountains to cascading waterfalls and tropical hideaways, every corner of this enchanting world is waiting for you. The glory is yours to seize! Take up the challenge of Kingdom Flipper and build a legacy that will be remembered until the end of time.
